definition: (used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: This is one of many cultural chasms across the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 這只是橫跨大西洋的諸多文化鴻溝之一。

sentences.english: Yet evidence abounds that banks are still gun-shy about lending to business.
sentences.chinese: 但是諸多證據顯示銀行對企業貸款仍是小心翼翼。

sentences.english: You can’t have good ideas unless you’re willing to generate a lot of bad ones.
sentences.chinese: 除非摒棄諸多不良想法纔會有好點子。

sentences.english: Many of the experiments involved pigs inflicted with near-fatal injuries.
sentences.chinese: 其中諸多實驗包括在豬隻身上施以幾近致命的傷害。

sentences.english: The southern paper-cut is folk custom culture product in south of our country.
sentences.chinese: 南方剪紙是我國南方諸多民族民俗文化的產物。

sentences.english: Many Chinese agricultural initiatives are shrouded in mystery.
sentences.chinese: 中國在農業方面的諸多舉措仍然充滿了神祕色彩。

sentences.english: The analysis indicated that the current method for machining the abnormal deep ostiole has many drawback.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，當前異形深小孔的加工技術存在諸多缺陷。

sentences.english: Being summed up, there are creditor's right theory, mixed-right theory and new-right theory in this field.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這一重大問題在理論界卻存在諸多分歧。

sentences.english: Virtual indestructibility was just one of the many perks I was looking forward to.
sentences.chinese: 金剛不壞之身只是我期許的諸多好處之一。

sentences.english: He has been awarded for several times the MEXT prize of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他曾經多次獲得日本文部科學大臣獎等諸多藝術獎項。

sentences.english: While modernity makes greater progress, it also brings with it a lot of malaises.
sentences.chinese: 現代性取得了巨大成就的同時，也帶了諸多的隱憂。

sentences.english: While we, when making a choice, are so full of hesitations and have so many doubts.
sentences.chinese: 而人們在做出種種選擇的時候總會參雜着諸多的猶豫。

sentences.english: Catalpa Po for repair units as soon as possible the owner, the owner of lining.
sentences.chinese: 梓博要求業主儘快維修單位，業主諸多推搪。

sentences.english: Present family planning policy has caused many disharmonies.
sentences.chinese: 現行計劃生育政策，造成了諸多的不和諧。

sentences.english: She provides little analysis of the corporate culture that led to the many snafus .
sentences.chinese: 她幾乎沒怎麼分析導致這諸多混亂的公司文化。

sentences.english: Praxair owns extensive experience in steel industry and contributes a number of innovative technologies.
sentences.chinese: 普萊克斯在鋼鐵領域具有豐富經驗和諸多技術貢獻。
